Section.Catchline: Deposit of certain tax receipts; refund of improper payments.

Subsection.Text: The Department of Financial Services shall promptly deposit in the State Treasury to the credit of the Insurance Regulatory Trust Fund all “state tax” portions of agents’ licenses collected under s. 624.501 necessary to fund the Division of Insurance Fraud. The balance of the tax shall be credited to the General Fund. All moneys received by the Department of Financial Services or the office not in accordance with the provisions of this code or not in the exact amount as specified by the applicable provisions of this code shall be returned to the remitter. The records of the department or office shall show the date and reason for such return.

The Department of Revenue shall promptly deposit in the Department of Revenue Premium Tax Clearing Trust Fund all premium taxes collected according to ss. 624.509, 624.510, and 624.515. Such taxes shall be distributed on an estimated basis within 15 days after receipt by the Department of Revenue. Such distribution shall be adjusted pursuant to an audit by the Department of Revenue.
